response.overview: Observing the film, people and people of different faiths came together and emphasized that all human beings differ in nothing but their language and country.  During the film, Reem Mustafa moved through the deserts of Egypt to meet with tribes and people of different customs and traditions, including the people of Nubia and North Sinai.  The film reviews the history of Philae Temple in Aswan and tells the tour guide of Philae Temple the story of this temple, saying "embodies the greatest love story in human history, the story of Isis and Osiris West and Horus"
response.title: نقطة تلاقى
